title: IHC seeks policy regarding early scheduling of case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 22 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Tuesday sought policy from deputy registrar judicial for early scheduling of appeals of PTI founder and Bushra Bibi in 190 million pounds reference.
A division bench comprising Acting Chief Justice Sardar Sarfraz Dogar and Justice Inam Ameen Minhas issued the order. It said that the application was filed for early hearing on the appeals.
The court directed the deputy registrar office to submit policy regarding scheduling of cases.
